sentences.sContent: They are called ‘Supertrams’, the implication being that (= which is meant to suggest that ) they are more advanced than earlier models.
sentences.sCn: 它们被称作“超级电车”，这是暗指它们比先前的型号更先进。

sentences.sContent: ...the implication of the question is that a more curious...
...still carry some useful information and implication for our daily lives...

remMethod.val: im ＋ pli(重) ＋ cation → 有双重意思 → 含意， 暗示

words.tran: 纠缠（implicate的过去式和过去分词）
暗示；使牵连其中；含有…的意思

trans.tranOther: a suggestion that is not made directly but that people are expected to understand or accept
